msg: SMX4NMR-118: Allow configuration of the shutdown timeout through a config file

author: olegk
msg: HTTPCORE-191: Blocking HTTP connections are now capable of correctly preserving their internal state on SocketTimeoutExceptions, which makes it possible to continue reading from the connection after a socket timeout.

msg: SMX4NMR-118: Add a shutdown monitor thread to the SA with a configurable timeout
